lead_paragraph: WILLIS--Robert C. July 21, 1946 - April 5, 2016. Former GM of Tavern on the Green and Maxwell's Plum. He is survived by his wife Linda, children, and grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WILLIS, ROBERT C
